title: Max Gentleman: A cross-platform postmortem of a game that 'lost us a lot of money'
text:

Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
A catalog of mistakes made and bad decisions: "Consider the game a charitable donation from us. It's good to get our sophomore slump out of ...
